# shinycgfs

Clone the directory via:

```
git clone https://github.com/fishvice/shinycgfs.git
```

To get the show running do within the directory:

```{r, eval = FALSE}
source("R/DATASET.R")  # takes a while, be patient
rmarkdown::run()
```
